00035 template <class DataType>
00036 class DzTSimpleArray {
00037 public:

00056     bool            append( int num, const DataType *obj );
00057     bool            append( const DzTSimpleArray<DataType> &from );
00058     void            appendIfUnique( const DataType obj ) { if( find( obj ) < 0 ) append( obj ); }
00059     bool            insert( int i, const DataType obj );
00060     void            removeByIndex( int index, int num = 1 );
00061     void            removeFromEnd( int num = 1 );
00062     bool            remove( const DataType obj );
00063     void            clear() { m_nItems = 0; }
00064     bool            setCount( int num, bool keepExisting = true );
00065     bool            preSize( int num, bool keepExisting = true );
00066     void            freeUnusedMemory();
00067     void            setGrowSize( int num ) { m_blockGrowSize = num; }
00068

00074     const DataType&         operator[]( int i ) const;
00075     inline int              count() const { return m_nItems; }

00078     inline const DataType*  getValues() const { return m_items; }

00098 /******************************************************************************/
00099 template <class DataType>
00100 DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::DzTSimpleArray( int bSize ) : m_blockGrowSize( bSize ),
00101     m_nItems( 0 ), m_items( NULL ), m_nSlots( 0 )
00102 {
00103     if( m_blockGrowSize <= 0 ){
00104         DZ_WARNING( "Invalid block grow size specified in DzTSimpleArray::DzTSimpleArray()" );
00105         m_blockGrowSize = 1;
00106     }
00107 }
00108 
00109 /******************************************************************************/
00110 template <class DataType>
00111 DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::DzTSimpleArray( const DzTSimpleArray<DataType> &obj ) :
00112     m_nItems( 0 ), m_items( NULL ), m_nSlots( 0 )
00113 {
00114     m_blockGrowSize = obj.m_blockGrowSize;
00115 
00116     append( obj.count(), obj.getValues() );
00117 }
00118 
00119 /******************************************************************************/
00120 template <class DataType>
00121 DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::~DzTSimpleArray()
00122 {
00123     if( m_items )
00124         dzFree( (void*) m_items );
00125 }

00143 /******************************************************************************/
00144 template <class DataType>
00145 DataType& DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::at( int i )
00146 {
00147     if( i < 0 || i >= m_nItems ) {
00148         if( m_nItems == 0 )
00149             throw "Illegal array index in DzTSimpleArray::at()";
00150         else {
00151             DZ_WARNING( "Illegal array index in DzTSimpleArray::at()" );
00152             return m_items[0];
00153         }
00154     }
00155     return m_items[i];
00156 }
00157 
00158 /******************************************************************************/
00159 template <class DataType>
00160 DataType& DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::operator[]( int i )
00161 {
00162     if( i < 0 || i >= m_nItems ) {
00163         if( m_nItems == 0 )
00164             throw "Illegal array index in DzTSimpleArray::operator[]";
00165         else {
00166             DZ_WARNING( "Illegal array index in DzTSimpleArray::operator[]" );
00167             return m_items[0];
00168         }
00169     }
00170     return m_items[i];
00171 }
00172 
00173 /******************************************************************************/
00174 template <class DataType>
00175 bool DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::append( const DataType obj )
00176 {
00177     if( m_nItems >= m_nSlots ) {
00178         if( !addSpace( m_blockGrowSize ) )
00179             return false;
00180     }
00181 
00182     m_items[m_nItems++] = obj;
00183 
00184     return true;
00185 }
00186 
00187 /******************************************************************************/
00188 template <class DataType>
00189 bool DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::append( int num, const DataType *obj )
00190 {
00191     if( num < 0 ){
00192         DZ_WARNING( "Less than one item specified for adding in DzTSimpleArray::append()" );
00193         return true;
00194     }
00195 
00196     if( ( m_nItems + num ) > m_nSlots ) {
00197         int     blockSize = num;
00198 
00199         if( num < m_blockGrowSize )
00200             blockSize = m_blockGrowSize;
00201 
00202         if( !addSpace( blockSize ) )
00203             return false;
00204     }
00205     memcpy( &(m_items[m_nItems]), obj, num * sizeof( DataType ) );
00206     m_nItems += num;
00207 
00208     return true;
00209 }
00210 
00211 /******************************************************************************/
00212 template <class DataType>
00213 bool DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::append( const DzTSimpleArray<DataType> &from )
00214 {
00215     return append( from.m_nItems, from.m_items );
00216 }
00217 
00218 /******************************************************************************/
00219 template <class DataType>
00220 bool DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::insert( int where, const DataType obj )
00221 {
00222     if( m_nItems >= m_nSlots ) {
00223         if( !addSpace( m_blockGrowSize ) )
00224             return false;
00225     }
00226 
00227     if( where >= m_nItems )
00228         return append( obj );
00229 
00230     memmove( &(m_items[where+1]), &(m_items[where]), ( m_nItems - where )
00231         * sizeof( DataType ) );
00232     m_items[where] = obj;
00233     m_nItems++;
00234 
00235     return true;
00236 }
00237 
00238 /******************************************************************************/
00239 template <class DataType>
00240 void DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::removeByIndex( int index, int num )
00241 {
00242     if( index < 0 || index >= m_nItems ){
00243         DZ_WARNING( "Index out of range in DzTSimpleArray::removeByIndex()" );
00244         return;
00245     }
00246 
00247     if( index + num > m_nItems ){
00248         DZ_WARNING( "Too many items specified for remove in DzTSimpleArray::removeByIndex()" );
00249         num = m_nItems - index;
00250     }
00251 
00252     memmove( &(m_items[index]), &(m_items[index+num]), ( m_nItems - index - num )
00253         * sizeof( DataType ) );
00254     m_nItems -= num;
00255 }
00256 
00257 /******************************************************************************/
00258 template <class DataType>
00259 void DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::removeFromEnd( int num )
00260 {
00261     if( num > m_nItems ){
00262         DZ_WARNING( "Too many items specified for remove in DzTSimpleArray::removeFromEnd()" );
00263         num = m_nItems;
00264     }
00265 
00266     m_nItems -= num;
00267 }
00268 
00269 /******************************************************************************/
00270 template <class DataType>
00271 bool DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::remove( const DataType obj )
00272 {
00273     int result = find( obj );
00274     if( result < 0 )
00275         return false;
00276 
00277     removeByIndex( result );
00278 
00279     return true;
00280 }
00281 
00282 /******************************************************************************/
00283 template <class DataType>
00284 bool DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::setCount( int num, bool keepExisting )
00285 {
00286     if( num < 0 ){
00287         DZ_WARNING( "Count less than 0 specifed in DzTSimpleArray::setCount()" );
00288         num = 0;
00289     }
00290 
00291     if( preSize( num, keepExisting ) ){
00292         m_nItems = num;
00293         return true;
00294     }
00295 
00296     return false;
00297 }
00298 
00299 /******************************************************************************/
00300 template <class DataType>
00301 bool DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::preSize( int num, bool keepExisting )
00302 {
00303     bool    status = true;
00304 
00305     if( num < 0 ){
00306         DZ_WARNING( "Count less than 0 specifed in DzTSimpleArray::preSize()" );
00307         num = 0;
00308     }
00309 
00310     if( num > m_nSlots ) {
00311         if( ( num - m_nSlots ) > m_blockGrowSize )
00312             status = addSpace( num - m_nSlots, keepExisting );
00313         else
00314             status = addSpace( m_blockGrowSize, keepExisting );
00315     }
00316 
00317     return status;
00318 }
00319 
00320 /******************************************************************************/
00321 template <class DataType>
00322 void DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::freeUnusedMemory()
00323 {
00324     if( m_nItems < m_nSlots ) {
00325         DataType *newItems = (DataType*) dzMalloc( m_nItems * sizeof( DataType ) );
00326 
00327         memcpy( newItems, m_items, m_nItems * sizeof( DataType ) );
00328         if( m_items )
00329             dzFree( (void*) m_items );
00330         m_items = newItems;
00331         m_nSlots = m_nItems;
00332     }
00333 }

00335 /******************************************************************************/
00336 template <class DataType>
00337 const DataType& DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::at( int i ) const
00338 {
00339     if( i < 0 || i >= m_nItems ) {
00340         if( m_nItems == 0 )
00341             throw "Illegal array index in DzTSimpleArray::at()";
00342         else {
00343             DZ_WARNING( "Illegal array index in DzTSimpleArray::at()" );
00344             return m_items[0];
00345         }
00346     }
00347     return m_items[i];
00348 }
00349 
00350 /******************************************************************************/
00351 template <class DataType>
00352 const DataType& DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::operator[]( int i ) const
00353 {
00354     if( i < 0 || i >= m_nItems ) {
00355         if( m_nItems == 0 )
00356             throw "Illegal array index in DzTSimpleArray::operator[]";
00357         else {
00358             DZ_WARNING( "Illegal array index in DzTSimpleArray::operator[]" );
00359             return m_items[0];
00360         }
00361     }
00362     return m_items[i];
00363 }

00365 /******************************************************************************/
00366 template <class DataType>
00367 int DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::find( const DataType obj ) const
00368 {
00369     int     i;
00370     DataType    *ptr = m_items;
00371 
00372     for( i = 0; i < m_nItems; i++, ++ptr ) {
00373         if( obj == *ptr )
00374             return i;
00375     }
00376     return -1;
00377 }
00378 
00379 /******************************************************************************/
00380 template <class DataType>
00381 int DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::getSize() const
00382 {
00383     int size = 0;
00384 
00385     size += m_nSlots * sizeof( DataType );
00386     size += 4 * 4;
00387 
00388     return size;
00389 }

00391 /******************************************************************************/
00392 template <class DataType>
00393 void DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::copyValues( const DzTSimpleArray<DataType> &from )
00394 {
00395     clear();
00396 
00397     append( from.count(), from.getValues() );
00398 
00399     m_blockGrowSize = from.m_blockGrowSize;
00400 }

00402 /******************************************************************************/
00403 template <class DataType>
00404 void DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::copyValues( const DzTSortedArray<DataType> &from )
00405 {
00406     clear();
00407 
00408     append( from.count(), from.getValues() );
00409 }

00411 /******************************************************************************/
00412 template <class DataType>
00413 bool DzTSimpleArray<DataType>::addSpace( int num, bool keepExisting )
00414 {
00415     DataType *newItems = (DataType*) dzMalloc( ( m_nSlots + num ) * sizeof( DataType ) );
00416 
00417     if( keepExisting && m_items )
00418         memcpy( newItems, m_items, m_nItems * sizeof( DataType ) );
00419 
00420     if( m_items )
00421         dzFree( (void*) m_items );
00422     m_items = newItems;
00423     m_nSlots += num;
00424 
00425     return true;
00426 }
